title: U.N. Myanmar expert says junta using new Russian, Chinese arms against civilians
description: The United Nations human rights expert on Myanmar on Tuesday said Russia and China were providing the junta with fighter jets being used against civilians, and urged the U.N. Security Council to halt the flow of weapons enabling atrocities.
